item.title: Bringing D&R to New Heights with Honeypots
item.description: Why honeypots should be included at the core of a D&RÂ program Traditional Detection Eng. There are plenty of resources out there such as the MITRE ATT&CK Matrix which describe common attack behaviors. Any Detection and Response (D&R) engineer could decribe in great detail multiple ways an attacker could move across their environment. They could even tell you what the attacker would likely target! So why is detecting malicious activity such a difficult task?
